original_title: in the realm of a dying star
overview: in the realm of a dying star is a selection of three pieces from an album of music and videos by Sarada Rauch. “Topple” reenacts a history of toppled colonialist statues, “Boomerang” considers contemporary colonialism in the form of gentrification and the Anthropocene, and “Second Law of Thermodynamics” is a deliberation of everyday objects around us whose production perpetuates exploitation.
title: in the realm of a dying star
